programme.title: XFL Football
programme.desc: D.C. Defenders at Orlando Guardians in Week 7 action. From Camping World Stadium.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, 'Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia.

programme.title: This Just In

programme.desc: In-depth discussions and highlights from around the NBA.

programme.title: NFL Live
programme.desc: National Football League news and discussion with host Laura Rutledge and a team of analysts including Marcus Spears, Mina Kimes, Dan Orlovsky and Keyshawn Johnson.

programme.title: Around the Horn
programme.desc: Columnists from around the U.S. debate hot sports topics in a competitive format and weigh in on stories from their region.

programme.title: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: Veteran sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Mike Wilbon debate and discuss hot sports topics, issues and events. An on-screen 'rundown' of the topics is a signature of the series, plus guests and responses to viewer e-mail.

programme.title: SportsCenter

programme.title: College GameDay
programme.desc: Rece Davis hosts an in-depth preview of the day's college basketball, including analysis, guests and features. Analysts include Jay Bilas, LaPhonso Ellis and Seth Greenberg.

programme.title: Blood Line: The Life and Times of Brian Deegan
programme.desc: The story and legacy of Brian Deegan, one of the most iconic legends in freestyle motocross and action sports. The documentary follows his impact on and off the track with his friends, family, and how he shaped the future of the popular action sport.

programme.title: World of X Games
programme.desc: Highlighting iconic performers and performances in the first 25 years of summer and winter X Games.

programme.title: E60
programme.desc: Celebrating the 50th anniversary of the 1972 Miami Dolphins' perfect season, with a look at failed attempts to match the accomplishment as it stands the test of time. Interviews include Pro Football Hall of Famers Paul Warfield, Larry Csonka, Larry Little, Bob Griese and Joe Namath. Jeremy Schaap reports.

programme.desc: Top college senior men and women compete in slam dunk and 3-point shooting contests in Houston.

programme.desc: Host Max Kellerman delivers the latest sports news, with opinion and analysis, joined by insiders and sport-specific analysts to examine current and upcoming stories from all angles.

programme.title: SportsCenter Special: Todd McShay's NFL Mock Draft 4.0
programme.desc: Todd McShay unveils his latest projections for the first round of the 2023 NFL Draft, with commentary and player profiles.

programme.title: Daily Wager
programme.desc: Point spreads and money lines are the focus of this look at today's sports and the latest news. Doug Kezirian hosts, with appearances by "Stanford" Steve Coughlin; Chris "The Bear" Fallica; David Purdum, Anita Marks, Preston Johnson and Joe Fortenbaugh.

programme.title: The Point
programme.desc: National Hockey League news, player profiles, previews and exclusive access. Host: John Buccigross.

programme.title: Don't Ever Give Up
programme.desc: Jim Valvano's iconic and inspirational 1993 ESPY speech, plus a compilation of ESPYs speeches from winners of the Jimmy V Award for Perseverance. Featured: Stuart Scott, Robin Roberts, Craig Sager and Jim Kelly.

programme.title: MLB Baseball
programme.desc: Cleveland Guardians at Seattle Mariners. From T-Mobile Park.

programme.title: MLB Baseball
programme.desc: Philadelphia Phillies at Texas Rangers. From Globe Life Field.

programme.sub-title: San Francisco Giants at New York Yankees

programme.title: The Carton Show
programme.desc: Craig Carton brings his unique style to the day's biggest sports stories. Joined by guests and analysts, Carton will give the first perspective of the day on all the major topics.

programme.title: Skip and Shannon: Undisputed
programme.desc: Skip and Shannon: Undisputed is a daily sports debate show starring Skip Bayless and Shannon Sharpe, and moderated by Jen Hale. Every day Skip and Shannon will give their unfiltered, incisive, passionate opinions on the biggest sports topics of the day.

programme.title: The Herd With Colin Cowherd
programme.desc: Host Colin Cowherd breaks down the biggest stories and interviews the biggest guests in sports. He is joined daily by news anchor Jason McIntyre.

programme.title: First Things First
programme.desc: Nick Wright, Chris Broussard, and Kevin Wildes bring viewers spirited dialogue and thought-provoking discussion on the day's biggest sports stories.

programme.title: Speak
programme.desc: Emmanuel Acho, Joy Taylor, and LeSean McCoy bring a fun, passionate, smart, and energetic discussion to the biggest sports topics of the day.

programme.title: NASCAR Race Hub
programme.desc: Daily motor-sports discussion and interviews from the "hub" of NASCAR in Charlotte.
